title: You can now train ChatGPT on your own documents via API
description: Developers can now bring their own data to customize GPT-3.5 Turbo outputs.

title: YouTube may face billions in fines if FTC confirms child privacy violations
description: Child groups asked the FTC to investigate YouTube ad placements on kids' videos.

title: WinRAR 0-day that uses poisoned JPG and TXT files under exploit since April
description: Vulnerability allows hackers to execute malicious code when targets open malicious ZIP files.

title: Dark Forces: Remaster gives you a cleaned-up 4K view of an absolute classic
description: Better cutscenes and resolutions, but all of the same Star Wars-but-Doom-iness

title: “Project Moohan” is Google and Samsung’s inevitable Apple Vision Pro clone
description: After a decade in the market with nothing to show for it, here's the latest plan.

title: These Pompeii victims choked on ash while covering themselves with garments
description: Study of plaster casts from Porta Nola indicate asphyxiation—but just for these cases.

title: Amazon tries to take over pirate sites that sold DVD copies of Rings of Power
description: Low-quality pirated DVDs allegedly "jeopardize Amazon's reputation for quality."

title: IBM team builds low-power analog AI processor
description: Huge arrays of phase-change material perform in-memory processing.

title: India becomes the fourth country to land a spacecraft on the Moon
description: Chandrayaan 3 landed closer to the Moon's south pole than any previous mission.

title: Report: Microsoft is “experimenting” with ways to work AI into bedrock Windows
description: Though thankfully, most features aren't in the "just add ChatGPT to it" genre.

title: Sony’s $200 handheld “Portal” can stream games from your PS5 and, uh, that’s it
description: Previously known as "PlayStation Q," the handheld is far from a new PlayStation Vita.

title: IBM’s generative AI tool aims to refactor ancient COBOL code for its mainframes
description: Humans are still "in the driver's seat," but it could make code more modular.

title: How ChatGPT turned generative AI into an “anything tool”
description: Until recently, AI models were specialized tools. Modern LLMs are different.

title: Valves are a regular concern at SpaceX, just like every other space company
description: “We’re humbled every time we learn something."
